kernel_error.c

00019 #include "kernel_error.h"
00020 #include <stdarg.h>
00021 #include <assert.h>
00022 #include <stdlib.h>
00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 
00025 #ifdef IPL98_ERRORS_TO_WINDOW
00026 extern void AddIPL98ErrorHistory(const char* str);
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00030 namespace ipl{ /* use namespace if C++ */
00031 extern "C" { /* prevent name mangling for C functions */
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 void k_ShowMessage(IPL_MESSAGETYPE MsgType, const TString* pLineAndFile,char* fmt, ...)
00035 {
00036         TString StrOut;
00037         char* p;
00038         va_list args; /* argument pointer */
00039 /* return if DISABLE is enabled and equals the given MsgType */
00040 #ifdef DISABLE_IPL_ERROR
00041         if (MsgType==IPL_ERROR)
00042                 return;
00043 #elif defined DISABLE_IPL_WARNING
00044         if (MsgType==IPL_WARNING)
00045                 return;
00046 #endif
00047         k_InitString(&StrOut);
00048         p=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE);
00049 
00050         va_start(args,fmt);
00051         if (vsprintf(p,fmt,args)>=MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE)
00052         {
00053                 k_AddCharArrayToString("IPL_ERROR: k_ShowMessage() Error message to long "
00054                         "- increase the MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE definition",&StrOut);
00055                 k_AddFileAndLine(StrOut);
00056                 fprintf(stderr,"%s\n",StrOut.pChars);
00057                 assert(0);
00058         }
00059         else if (MsgType==IPL_ERROR)
00060         {
00061                 k_AddCharArrayToString("IPL_ERROR: ",&StrOut);
00062                 k_AddCharArrayToString(p,&StrOut);
00063                 k_AddCharToString(' ',&StrOut);
00064                 k_AddCharArrayToString(pLineAndFile->pChars,&StrOut);
00065         }
00066         else if (MsgType==IPL_WARNING)
00067         {
00068                 k_AddCharArrayToString("IPL_WARNING: ",&StrOut);
00069                 k_AddCharArrayToString(p,&StrOut);
00070                 k_AddCharArrayToString(pLineAndFile->pChars,&StrOut);
00071         }
00072         else if (MsgType==IPL_NORMAL)
00073         {
00074                 k_AddCharArrayToString(p,&StrOut);
00075         }
00076         else
00077         {
00078                 /* should not be possible to get here! */
00079                 k_AddCharArrayToString("Error: k_ShowMessage() unknown message type",&StrOut);
00080         }
00081         k_AddCharToString('\n',&StrOut);
00082         va_end(args);
00083         free(p);
00084 
00085         /***********************************************************
00086          * To change the destination of error messages made by     *
00087          * IPL98 replace the code below with your own              *
00088          * The resulting string is accessed by "StrOut.pChars"     *
00089          ***********************************************************/
00090         printf("%s",StrOut.pChars);
00091 #ifdef IPL98_ERRORS_TO_WINDOW
00092         AddIPL98ErrorHistory(StrOut.pChars);
00093 #endif
00094 
00095         /* Don't delete this line */
00096         k_EmptyString(&StrOut);
00097 
00098 }
00099 
00100 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00101 } /* end of extern "C" */
00102 } /* end namespace ipl */
00103 #endif
